name: Teenage Mystery - Love Romance Story
description:
Get ready for the spectacular interactive story games full of amazing choices and incredible mysteries. Stupendous love game “Teenage Mystery - Love Romance Story” will take your breath away so be a part of the most thrilling teenager story EVER!

What’s the secret behind an intriguing family mystery? What happens on the night of a full moon? You can discover if you play these extraordinary romance games. Deal with incredible mystery, time travel and fantasy in the phenomenal love interactive story games for teenage girls. Start an incredible journey with elements of love, uncertainty and secrecy. You are the heroine of the terrific interactive story games and you control what happens next. Will you choose an ordinary life or a life full of excitement and supernatural things? 

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.teenage.mystery

Download on AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/teenage-mystery-teen-love/id1439786901
